title: Espire Hospitality Group to expand its luxury portfolio, to add three ZANA resorts
description: Espire Hospitality Group has launched its new resort, 'ZANA Forest Resort, Ranthambore,' near Ranthambore National Park and Tiger Reserve. This is the second resort under their 'ZANA - Luxury Escapes' brand. The resort offers 20 cottages and rooms, along with amenities such as tennis and badminton courts, football, billiards, and karaoke.
